name: Megaman X GiantBomb
description:
Here's something I work on for fun when I need a break from my main project. There are currently only two boss fights and they both share a BG -_-;; The plan is to eventually get to them all, but since I'm only working on this when I need a break from my main, it likely it won't be finished for a while to come =P

Controls:

Arrow Keys to move.

Z or C to shoot

X to jump

Down + X to slide

Enter to start.

You can also use a 360 controller if you've got one plugged in =)
